channel.title: Git basic commands on Documentation by Naveen
channel.description: Recent content in Git basic commands on Documentation by Naveen

item.title: Add git to an Existing Project
item.description: Add git to an Existing Project Goto http://www.initializr.com/ for download the web project Click bootstrap, select all optional requrements and download it. It will give the zip format content. extract it into the same directory └──╼ $unzip Downloads/initializr-verekia-4.0.zip Archive: Downloads/initializr-verekia-4.0.zip inflating: initializr/index.html Rename the project └──╼ $mv initializr web-project └──╼ $cd web-project/ └──╼ $ls 404.html apple-touch-icon.png browserconfig.xml crossdomain.xml css favicon.ico fonts humans.txt img index.html js robots.txt tile.png tile-wide.png Add the git source control

item.title: starting from fresh project
item.description: initiate the git empty repository as a new fresh project └──╼ $git init fresh-project Initialized empty Git repository in /home/redhat/git-learning/git-commands/fresh-project/.git/ move into the project directory and looks the files creatred by git └──╼ $cd fresh-project/ └──╼ $ls -la total 12 drwxrwxr-x 3 redhat redhat 4096 Apr 14 11:31 . drwxrwxr-x 3 redhat redhat 4096 Apr 14 11:31 .. drwxrwxr-x 7 redhat redhat 4096 Apr 14 11:31 .git git status - command gives the current status of the repository └──╼ $git status On branch master No commits yet nothing to commit (create/copy files and use "git add" to track) On branch master - refers we are in the master branch
